pages.about: About Body Bliss Fitness Club - Your Partner in Health and Wellness in India bodybliss@gmail.com Nagpur, Maharashtra 440010, India Home About us Contacts Our Story Greetings from your personal trainer Welcome to Body Bliss! I'm here to guide you on your fitness journey. Let's work together to achieve your health and wellness goals. What's my journey? I'm passionate about fitness and helping others live their best lives. My journey is to inspire and motivate you to become the best version of yourself. Our Offerings Embark on a fitness journey like no other at Body Bliss, where we offer a range of specialized programs designed to optimize your health and wellness goals. From personalized training sessions to tailored nutrition plans, we're committed to helping you achieve your fitness aspirations. Discover the endless possibilities for fitness transformation with Body Bliss. Our dedicated team of trainers and instructors are here to support you every step of the way, ensuring that each workout is both challenging and rewarding, bringing you closer to your peak physical condition. Dive into a world of fitness excellence with Body Bliss. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned athlete, our state-of-the-art facilities and expert guidance will elevate your training experience, unlocking new levels of strength, flexibility, and endurance. Experience the holistic approach to fitness at Body Bliss, where we prioritize not only physical strength but also mental and emotional well-being. Our diverse range of classes and wellness programs cater to all ages and fitness levels, fostering a supportive community committed to your overall health. Immerse yourself in the Body Bliss lifestyle and discover the transformative power of movement and mindfulness. From yoga and Pilates to high-intensity interval training, our diverse class offerings provide something for everyone, ensuring that your fitness journey is both enjoyable and effective. Welcome to Body Bliss, where fitness meets fulfillment. Our inclusive environment and expert guidance create the perfect setting for you to explore your potential, break barriers, and achieve your fitness dreams. Join us today and start your journey towards a healthier, happier you. Join the Body Bliss community and unleash your inner athlete. With our comprehensive approach to fitness and unwavering support, we empower you to push your limits, exceed your expectations, and embrace a lifestyle of vitality and strength. Your fitness transformation starts here. My accomplishments by the numbers Step into a world of success! With dedication and hard work, I've achieved milestones that speak volumes about my journey in the fitness industry. 10+ Years of expertise 1,250 Classes delivered 1,000 Satisfied clients Our Core Values At Body Bliss, our core values guide everything we do. They reflect our commitment to excellence and passion for helping our clients achieve their fitness goals. Commitment At Body Bliss, commitment is our promise. We are dedicated to helping you reach your fitness goals every step of the way. Motivation At Body Bliss, we believe in the power of motivation. Our goal is to inspire and empower you to push beyond your limits and achieve greatness. Teamwork Teamwork is key at Body Bliss. We believe in the strength of unity, working together to achieve extraordinary results. Passion Passion drives everything we do at Body Bliss. We are deeply passionate about fitness and helping you live your best life. Book a Class Fitness Classes Explore our diverse range of fitness classes Pilates Classes Dive into the world of Pilates and strengthen your body and mind. Learn More CrossFit Classes Experience the intensity of CrossFit and push your limits to new heights. Learn More Bikram Yoga Classes Embrace the heat and flow through Bikram Yoga classes for enhanced flexibility and strength. Learn More Zumba Classes Dance your way to fitness with our high-energy Zumba classes. Learn More Athletic Conditioning Classes Improve your athletic performance with our dynamic conditioning classes. Learn More Bootcamp Classes Get ready to sweat it out in our challenging bootcamp classes. I agree Privacy Policy Contact Details Phone +91-489-6579945 Email bodybliss@gmail.com Frequently Asked Questions Here are answers to some frequently asked questions about our services. Book a Class Is prior experience required for your classes? No, previous experience is not required. Our classes are suitable for all levels. Do you offer trial classes? Yes, we provide trial classes for new participants to experience our services before committing. What is the duration of your classes? Our classes typically last for one hour, but the duration may vary depending on the program. Do you offer on-site classes or only virtual ones? We offer both on-site and virtual classes to accommodate different preferences and needs. Do you provide 1-on-1 classes and personal training? Yes, we offer personalized 1-on-1 classes and personal training sessions tailored to individual goals. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Body Bliss Fitness Club India bodybliss@gmail.com Nagpur, Maharashtra 440010, India Home About us Contacts Information Privacy Policy Introduction: Welcome to the Privacy Policy of Body Bliss Fitness Club. This document outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website or services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. Information We Collect: We collect various types of information when you visit our website or use our services. This may include personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details. We also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information. How We Use Your Information: Your information is used to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you. We may use your information to send you promotional emails, respond to your inquiries, and process transactions. Information Sharing: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent. However, we may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party sites, products, or services. These third-party sites have their own privacy policies, which we encourage you to review. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. Data Security: We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use encryption, firewalls, and other industry-standard security practices to safeguard your data. Data Retention: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and to comply with legal obligations. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it. Children's Privacy: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can delete the information. Changes to This Policy: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the effective date will be updated accordingly. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Your Consent: By using our website or services, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy and the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described herein. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at bodybliss@gmail.com. GDPR Compliance: We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and ensuring the rights of individuals regarding their personal data. If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights under the GDPR, including the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data. International Users: Our services are governed by United States law. If you are accessing our website from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States. By using our website or services, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States. Effective Date: This Privacy Policy was last updated. Any changes or updates to this policy will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Opt-Out: If you no longer wish to receive promotional emails or other communications from us, you may opt-out by following the instructions provided in the email or contacting us directly. Acceptance: By using our website or services, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our website or services. Fitness club Pages Home About us Review Utility Contacts FAQ Classes Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Body Bliss Fitness Club India bodybliss@gmail.com Nagpur, Maharashtra 440010, India Home About us Contacts Information Terms and Conditions Introduction: Welcome to the Terms and Conditions of Body Bliss Fitness Club. These terms govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions. Use of Our Website: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use our website in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations or infringes on the rights of others. Membership: To access certain features of our website or services, you may be required to register for an account. By creating an account, you agree to provide accurate and complete information and to keep your login credentials confidential. Intellectual Property: The content, design, and layout of our website are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content from our website without our prior written consent. Limitation of Liability: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our website or services. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information on our website. Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Body Bliss Fitness Club, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or losses arising out of your use of our website or services or your violation of these terms and conditions. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party sites, products, or services. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these sites. You access third-party sites at your own risk. Changes to These Terms: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of our website constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. Termination: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website or services for any reason, including violation of these terms and conditions or misuse of our website. Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms and conditions or your use of our website shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association. Severability: If any provision of these terms and conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Governing Law: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at bodybliss@gmail.com. Acceptance: By using our website or services, you signify your acceptance of these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.
